item.title: Automatic data prep
item.description: Packages Used library(tidyverse) library(taskscheduleR) library(kableExtra) library(boxr) Data prep seems to be a common task required for anything involving data, something even as simple as renaming columns. I’ve been thinking recently how we could automate the reports being pulled and then using R to prep this data and then following on from this, have data vizualisation auto refresh the data. The example I’ll use is taking e.g. sales data from a reporting system (IBM’s Cognos).
